system_prompt: Maximum information density. No filler words, no elaboration, no examples unless essential. Short sentences. Telegram style. Every word must earn its place. If you can cut a word without losing meaning, cut it.
user_prompt: Write about: The appeal of horror fiction
generated_text:
Fear stimulates adrenaline release.
Adrenaline rush satisfies primal human need.
Horror fiction taps into this need.
Explores darker aspects of human nature.
Makes us confront mortality.
Provides temporary escape from reality.
Satisfies morbid curiosity.
Fosters empathy through relatable terror.
Catharsis through shared fear.
Builds community through collective scream.
Evokes primal response.
Fascinates and repels at once.
